0.1.0.name: atom-fix-path
0.1.0.description: Preserve `$PATH` when you launch Atom from it's icon or a launcher

readme:
# Atom fix-path package

Wraps [fix-path]() in atom package to [preserve `$PATH` when you launch Atom](https://github.com/rgbkrk/atom-script#atom-cant-find-node--ruby--python--my-socks) from it's icon or Spotlight.

metadata.name: atom-fix-path
metadata.description: Preserve `$PATH` when you launch Atom from it's icon or a launcher
